footer.description: Pakistan's first women-to-women ride-hailing service. Safe, reliable, and culturally respectful transportation for women, by women.
footer.disclaimer: NisaDrive is committed to providing safe, reliable, and culturally respectful transportation services for women across Pakistan. We operate with full compliance to local regulations and maintain the highest standards of safety and security. All rides are tracked, drivers are thoroughly vetted, and 24/7 support is available. By using our services, you agree to our terms and conditions.

story.paragraph1: NisaDrive was born from a deeply personal challenge‚Äîone that countless women in Pakistan silently endure every day: the simple act of commuting. Our story began with Tasmia Zehra, a bright and determined AI student, who missed classes and opportunities just because her school van broke down or was unavailable.
story.paragraph2: That frustration turned into inspiration. Guided by her dream to remove barriers to women's mobility, she envisioned NisaDrive‚Äîa ride-hailing platform designed by women, for women.
story.paragraph3: What started as an idea has grown into a nationwide movement, nurtured under the umbrella of the Fatima AI Research Institute (FAIRIST)‚Äîa forward-looking organization committed to "AI for All" and social innovation.

whatIs.question: What is NisaDrive?
whatIs.answer: NisaDrive is a women-centric ride-hailing service designed to provide safe, affordable, and culturally appropriate transportation for women in Pakistan. The platform empowers women both as passengers and as driver-partners (affiliates).

whoCanDrive.question: Who can become a NisaDrive driver/affiliate?
whoCanDrive.answer: Any woman who meets the minimum age and licensing requirements and has access to a bike or can purchase one (with or without NisaDrive's support) may register as an affiliate driver.

availability.question: Is NisaDrive available in my city?
availability.answer: NisaDrive is launching pilot operations in Rawalpindi. Expansion to other cities will follow based on demand and feasibility assessments.

safety.question: How does NisaDrive ensure rider safety?
safety.answer: All drivers undergo background verification, safety and customer care training. The app includes emergency SOS, geo-fencing, real-time tracking, and 24/7 support.

hours.question: What are NisaDrive's working hours?
hours.answer: Our working hours include 07 am-07 pm daily, however affiliates manage their own schedules; nevertheless, the app and customer support operate 24/7 to ensure availability and safety.

fare.question: How is fare calculated on NisaDrive?
fare.answer: Fare is calculated based on standard per-kilometer rates. Rates are designed to be affordable for users while offering sustainable income for affiliates.

refund.question: What if I want to cancel a ride or request a refund?
refund.answer: Please refer to our Refund & Cancellation Policy, available in the Legal section of the app or website.

privacy.question: How does NisaDrive protect my personal data?
privacy.answer: NisaDrive complies with PECA 2016 and proposed Data Protection Bill guidelines to protect personal information, supported by our Privacy and Data Sharing Policies.

menUse.question: Can men use NisaDrive?
menUse.answer: No, NisaDrive is exclusively designed for women passengers and women drivers to maintain cultural and personal comfort.

internship.question: How can I join the NisaDrive Internship Program?
internship.answer: You can sign up for early access to internships by visiting the Careers section of our website and subscribing to updates.
